posts.post_title: FS 2 Different SGC 50 T206 Ford, Goode
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following two SGC 50 graded T206 cards for sale.

Russell Ford Sweet Caporal 350-460, Factory 42$45.00 SOLD
Wilbur Goode Piedmont 350, Factory 25$45.00

Note: SGC mislabeled the Ford card a T205. Oops!

Take both for $80.00

Shipping: $3.00

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.


Thanks for looking,

Joe

Hi Joe

I'm more of a Chevy man, but I will gladly give that Ford a nice home. :)

If it is still available, PM me your mailing address and I will have the payment in the mail soon.

Thanks

Jantz
